channel.title: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD)
channel.description: Daily Feed (Updated 9 AM BD) generated by script

item.title: New in SpyWeek: CIA's Venezuela Ops, Ukraine Spies' Kremlin Prank, FBI and Terror Plotters
item.description: Welcome to Spy Week, a curated compilation of important news from the intersection of intelligence, foreign policy, national security and military operations.

item.title: ‘A line crossed’: Lawmakers, lawyers, anti-war advocates alarmed by Venezuela overthrow
item.description: The lack of Congressional notification stokes fears of another "forever war."

item.title: A Strategic Break for South America
item.description: In the wake of Maduro’s capture, governments across the continent are facing uncomfortable questions about deterrence and autonomy.

item.title: How ‘Absolute Resolve’ harnessed 150 aircraft and more to launch a regime change in Venezuela
item.description: The Joint Chiefs chair described the "precise" and "unprecedented" military operation at a Saturday press conference.

item.title: How the Pentagon snatched Nicolás Maduro
item.description: Operation Absolute Resolve was a textbook success

item.title: Global Leaders React to U.S. Operation in Venezuela
item.description: Some praised Washington’s attack, while others called the capture of Maduro a violation of international law.

item.title: Trump Sets a Devastating Precedent in Venezuela
item.description: Will Russia and China now assume they can do the same in Europe and Asia?

item.title: Donald Trump wants to run Venezuela, and dominate the western hemisphere
item.description: Snatching Nicolás Maduro and attempting to take control of Venezuela and its oil is an extraordinary display of the new “Donroe doctrine”

item.title: US spy agencies contributed to operation that captured Maduro
item.description: The CIA helped locate the Venezuelan leader while others monitored electronic communications.

item.title: The US will ‘run’ Venezuela for now, Trump says after armed assault on capital
item.description: Regime-change operation bombed multiple sites, seized president early on Saturday.

item.title: Trump Says U.S. Forces Have Captured Venezuela’s Maduro
item.description: The operation followed hours of military strikes and a monthslong U.S. pressure campaign.

item.title: The United States has captured Venezuela’s dictator, Nicolás Maduro
item.description: After months of military build up, an overnight bombing campaign and helicopter raid has deposed Venezuela’s strongman
